title: The New Tarot (with Michelle Tea)
itunes:title: The New Tarot (with Michelle Tea)
description: Jessa invites Michelle Tea, author of “Modern Tarot: Connecting with Your Higher Self through the Wisdom of the Cards” and “Black Wave,” onto the show to discuss Tarot’s relevance and application in the modern era. They get into the Patriarchal origins of Tarot, its representations of masculinity and femininity, and how Tarot’s been redesigned to better reflect our world today.
